title: Analytical Creativity
desc: Employment of both critical and creative thinking– built upon a foundation of analytical problem solving and instructional design– to build solutions across all forms of media, on multiple platforms.

title: Musician
desc: Performing guitarist and multi-instrumentalist with strong formal training in music theory, tonal harmony, and improvisation. Musically comprehensive writer, composer, arranger, and transcriber.

title: Coordinator
desc: Excel in project management, working as an individual and in groups towards task creation and completion against dynamic timelines, as well as in staff acquisition and supervision, including the building and administering of interactive staff training.

title: Instructor and Tutor
desc: Highly diversified experience providing one-on-one and group-format academic tutoring and music instruction (instrumental performance and music theory) for a wide range of clientele.

title: Verbal
desc: Skillful in articulating eloquent interpersonal communication for internal and external stakeholders, including written or text-based copy and correspondence (from email communication, to formal proposals and grant writing, to creative copy for promotional content), group-format verbal presentation, and presentation through digital media (video tutorials, web-based livestreamed workshops, podcasting, etc.).

title: Software
desc: Office: Google G Suite and Microsoft Office Suite; Video/Graphic: Adobe Creative Suite and Final Cut Pro; Music: Sibelius and Logic Pro; Front End Development: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React.
